attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sign here if you want the tax man to leave, he’s screwed up the financial system, and charging banks an interest of 12% and telling us were about to hit the worst recession country has ever seen, I cant wait for the elections remember people who got is in this position, the 10p tax, car tax banking problems, northern rock leaks… get rid of this rubbish (soon known as the x-pm).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
